thread.title: Since 1880, Global Government Debts Have Rarely Been So High - Real Time Economics - WSJ

author: Josh Zumbrun
title: Since 1880, Global Government Debts Have Rarely Been So High - Real Time Economics - WSJ
text: Nearly a decade after the global financial crisis, the worldâ€™s economies have made essentially no progress reining in levels of government debt with little historical precedent.
